languages.title: Factorial Calculator
languages.description: Calculates the factorial of a given number
languages.hint: Use recursion or a loop to multiply the number by each positive integer less than it.

languages.title: Faktöriyel Hesaplayıcı
languages.hint: Rekursif veya döngü kullanarak sayıyı kendisinden küçük pozitif tam sayılarla çarp.
